Scene:
The Laughter Drug
(Shimada no shuku waraigusuri / 島田駅笑ひ薬)

Play: The Story of the Morning Glory (生写朝顔話)

Production: May 1978



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Midoridayū (竹本緑大夫)

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Seitomo II (鶴澤清友 (二))

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))



Performers:
